meanings.definition: To give shape or structure to something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully formates the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: The architect formates the blueprints for the new building.
meanings.sent3: The artist formates the colors on the canvas like a master painter.
meanings.sent4: Her guidance formates the team into a cohesive unit.
meanings.sent5: The teacher formates the lesson plan for easy understanding.

meanings.definition: A salt or ester of formic acid.
meanings.sent1: The laboratory assistant prepared the formates for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of different formates.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added formates instead of sugar to the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The collection included various formates from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The bottle contained a solution of formates for cleaning purposes.
